title: Pedall - Cycle shop
description: A full-featured Cycle shop with product listings, cart functionality, user authentication, and payment integration.
longDescription: This e-commerce platform provides a comprehensive solution for online retail. It features a responsive product catalog with filtering and search capabilities, a shopping cart with persistent storage, user authentication and profile management, secure checkout with Stripe integration, and an admin dashboard for inventory management. The application is built with React for the frontend, Node.js and Express.js for the backend, and MongoDB for data storage. It implements best practices for security, performance, and user experience.
features: Responsive product catalog with filtering and search
Secure checkout with Shurjo Pay integration
challenges: Building a responsive UI for all device sizes
solutions: Used Shurjo Pay secure API for payment processing
Implemented database indexing and query optimization
Utilized Tailwind CSS for responsive design

title: MediMart - Online Pharmacy
description: A modern e-commerce platform for purchasing medicines online, featuring secure authentication, prescription compliance, and order tracking.
longDescription: MediMart is a comprehensive online pharmacy solution that allows users to browse, search, and purchase medicines with ease. The platform ensures prescription compliance for specific medications and provides a seamless shopping experience. It includes secure JWT-based authentication, role-based access control for customers and admins, and an intuitive admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and users. Built with Next.js and TypeScript for the frontend, and Node.js with Express for the backend, MediMart offers a robust and scalable architecture.
features: User authentication with JWT and bcryptjs
Medicine catalog with search and filtering
Admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and users
challenges: Ensuring prescription compliance for certain medicines
Designing a responsive and user-friendly interface
solutions: Utilized JWT for secure authentication and bcryptjs for password hashing
Integrated prescription upload feature with validation
Applied Tailwind CSS for responsive design across devices

title: Auto Plus - Car Resale Platform
description: A car resale web application enabling users to list, browse, and purchase vehicles, with dedicated dashboards for buyers, sellers, and admins.
longDescription: Auto Plus is a full-featured car resale platform that facilitates seamless interactions between buyers and sellers. Users can register, log in, and browse available vehicles. Sellers have access to a dashboard to add and manage their listings, while admins can oversee all users and listings. The application is built with React.js for the frontend and utilizes Firebase for authentication and hosting. Tailwind CSS ensures a responsive design, and React Router manages client-side routing.
features: User registration and login with Firebase Authentication
Seller dashboard to add and manage car listings
Admin dashboard to manage users and listings
Integration of icons using React Icons
challenges: Managing different user roles and permissions
solutions: Implemented role-based access control within the application
Leveraged Firebase's real-time capabilities for dynamic data updates
Designed user-centric dashboards with clear navigation and functionality

title: DevAsFahim Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and contact information, built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
longDescription: DevAsFahim Portfolio is a modern and responsive personal portfolio website designed to highlight professional projects, technical skills, and provide contact information. Built using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, the site ensures fast performance and a seamless user experience. It features a clean layout, interactive project showcases, and an integrated contact form powered by EmailJS for direct communication.
features: Responsive design compatible with all devices
Smooth scrolling and interactive UI elements
challenges: Ensuring fast load times and performance
Integrating a reliable contact form without a backend
solutions: Utilized Tailwind CSS for responsive and utility-first styling
Optimized images and code splitting with Next.js
Integrated EmailJS for frontend-based email functionality

title: Meta Zone - Service Portfolio Platform
description: A service portfolio platform allowing users to add services, leave reviews, and manage personal feedback, built with React and Firebase.
longDescription: Meta Zone is a dynamic service portfolio platform where users can explore various services, add their own offerings, and provide feedback through reviews. The application features user authentication, service management, and a review system. Built with React.js and styled using Tailwind CSS, it leverages Firebase for backend services, including authentication and real-time database functionalities.
solutions: Utilized Firebase's real-time database for live updates
Implemented authentication and validation for user inputs
Applied Tailwind CSS for a clean and responsive UI

title: EAcademy - Online Learning Platform
description: An online learning platform offering various courses, featuring user authentication, course details, and PDF generation.
longDescription: EAcademy is a React.js-based online course platform that allows users to browse a variety of courses. The application incorporates React Router for navigation, Bootstrap for styling, and Firebase for authentication and data storage. Users can register or log in to access course details, and there's functionality to generate course information as PDFs using react-to-pdf.
features: User registration and login with Firebase Authentication
challenges: Integrating PDF generation for course details
solutions: Implemented react-to-pdf for generating course PDFs
Utilized Firebase Authentication for secure user management
Applied Bootstrap classes for responsive UI design
